title: (x) Tommy Hilfiger Ts - Alba, Kravitz Extra Thermal {David H}
content:
1st one should be ' [Alba / Alba Super](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052604/http:/www.fontalicious.com/super/alba.html)', from [Fontalicous](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052604/http:/www.fontalicious.com/)..   
Edit.: 2nd one should be ' [Kravitz Extra Thermal](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052604/http:/www.fontalicious.com/super/extrat.html)', also from [Fontalicous](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052604/http:/www.fontalicious.com/)..   
   
_Seems like 'Tommy' just loves Fontalicious.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052604im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)_
author: formlos

comments.content: The second looks like mixed use of [Chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052604/http:/houseind.com/house.php?kit=CHALET-FO&sub=view).
Sorry, didn't see the edit on David's post...

![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052604im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
_Sorry.. Hmm..   
Nah, its not really cheating, I would call it, hmm, slightly-after-posting-noticing-that-the-other-type-is-a-fontalicious-type-too-re-editing.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052604im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
And you all may know that Typophile restricts editing to 60 minutes after the original post..   
So, beyond that, its not possible to add or edit anything.._
